data.lyric:
[ti:Head Above Water]
[ar:Avril Lavigne]
[al:Head Above Water]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Head Above Water - Avril Lavigne (艾薇儿)
[00:06.29]I've gotta keep the calm before the storm
[00:13.07]I don't want less I don't want more
[00:19.55]Must bar the windows and the doors
[00:26.02]To keep me safe to keep me warm
[00:32.20]Yeah my life is what I'm fighting for
[00:38.92]Can't part the sea can't reach the shore
[00:45.12]And my voice becomes the driving force
[00:51.61]I won't let this pull me overboard
[00:57.07]God keep my head above water
[01:01.06]Don't let me drown it gets harder
[01:04.79]I'll meet you there at the altar
[01:08.99]As I fall down to my knees
[01:11.76]Don't let me drown drown drown
[01:15.85]Don't let me don't let me don't let me drown
[01:20.34]So pull me up from down below
[01:26.77]'Cause I'm underneath the undertow
[01:33.39]Come dry me off and hold me close
[01:39.84]I need you now I need you most
[01:45.08]God keep my head above water
[01:49.03]Don't let me drown it gets harder
[01:52.78]I'll meet you there at the altar
[01:56.98]As I fall down to my knees
[01:59.78]Don't let me drown drown drown
[02:03.86]Don't let me don't let me don't let me drown
[02:07.36]Don't let me drown drown drown
[02:10.97]And keep my head above water
[02:12.50]Don't let me don't let me don't let me drown
[02:14.22]Above water
[02:16.19]And I can't see in the stormy weather
[02:23.53]I can't seem to keep it all together
[02:30.77]And I I can't swim the ocean like this forever
[02:38.10]And I can't breathe
[02:42.40]God keep my head above water
[02:46.36]I lose my breath at the bottom
[02:49.96]Come rescue me I'll be waiting
[02:54.14]I'm too young to fall asleep
[02:57.18]God keep my head above water
[03:01.05]Don't let me drown it gets harder
[03:04.85]I'll meet you there at the altar
[03:09.05]As I fall down to my knees
[03:12.15]Don't let me drown
[03:15.77]Don't let me drown
[03:17.26]Don't let me don't let me don't let me drown
[03:19.35]Don't let me drown
[03:22.83]And keep my head above water
[03:24.39]Don't let me don't let me don't let me drown
[03:26.08]Above water
data.trans:
[ti:Head Above Water]
[ar:Avril Lavigne]
[al:Head Above Water]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.29]暴风骤至之前我得镇定以待
[00:13.07]我不想痛失什么 更不愿奢求什么
[00:19.55]我一定会闭锁门窗
[00:26.02]只为护自己周全 只为那一丝温暖
[00:32.20]是啊 此生 便是意义所在
[00:38.92]只是漂泊无依 无法抵达彼岸
[00:45.12]而我的声声呐喊唤醒了心底的倔强
[00:51.61]我怎会甘愿就此沉沦 沉浸苦海
[00:57.07]上帝 让我不再湎于那苦海
[01:01.06]别让我沉溺其中 呼吸愈发艰难
[01:04.79]我会于你的圣坛前
[01:08.99]双膝跪地 虔诚祈祷
[01:11.76]别让我沉溺 淹没其中
[01:15.85]别让我沉溺 淹没其中
[01:20.34]请救我逃离这地狱深渊
[01:26.77]因为我快要被那惊涛骇浪吞没
[01:33.39]请拭去我身上的水渍 将我拥入怀抱
[01:39.84]此刻我需要你 非常需要你
[01:45.08]上帝 让我不再湎于那苦海
[01:49.03]别让我沉溺其中 呼吸愈发艰难
[01:52.78]我会于你的圣坛前
[01:56.98]双膝跪地 虔诚祈祷
[01:59.78]别让我沉溺 淹没其中
[02:03.86]别让我沉溺 淹没其中
[02:07.36]别让我沉溺 淹没其中
[02:10.97]让我不再湎于那苦海
[02:12.50]别让我沉溺 淹没其中
[02:14.22]不再沉溺
[02:16.19]暴风骤雨模糊了我的视线
[02:23.53]这世界仿佛都已支离破碎
[02:30.77]而这无边的苦海似乎也没有尽头
[02:38.10]我已无法呼吸
[02:42.40]上帝 让我不再湎于那苦海
[02:46.36]深渊之中我已无法呼吸
[02:49.96]请拯救我逃离其中 我会默默等候
[02:54.14]我不愿年轻的生命就此沉睡
[02:57.18]上帝 让我不再湎于那苦海
[03:01.05]别让我沉溺其中 呼吸愈发艰难
[03:04.85]我会于你的圣坛前
[03:09.05]双膝跪地 虔诚祈祷
[03:12.15]别让我沉溺
[03:15.77]别让我淹没其中
[03:17.26]别让我沉溺 淹没其中
[03:19.35]别让我沉溺
[03:22.83]让我不再湎于那苦海
[03:24.39]别让我沉溺 淹没其中
[03:26.08]不再沉溺
